description: Styles for the interactive Tic Tac Toe frontend, including light and dark theme management, responsive design elements, and animations for the app logo.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the Tic Tac Toe application, applying the primary theme color and centering its content.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including animation for spinning.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application, styled with theme colors and flexbox layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, with color transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button used to switch between light and dark themes.
